channel.title: ssh on K5d
channel.description: Recent content in ssh on K5d

item.title: How to connect to a service on the remote server via ssh tunnel
item.description: Hello, today we will talk about connecting to remote service via SSH tunnel. I use Ubuntu 20.04 to test. Have fun! Imagine that you have a MySQL server listen on port 3306. For security reasons, your firewall denies port 3306 from the internet. And you have a ssh account to connect to your server. Normally you can ssh to the server then use mysql client console to interact with the database.
